languages.text: "Угу. А еще в их вымирании им сильно подсобили твои дружки-приятели и ты сам. Сотри свою паскудную улыбку с лица, изверг, они тебе все же родичами приходились!"
"Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"
languages.original_text: "Угу. А еще в их вымирании им сильно подсобили твои дружки-приятели и ты сам. Сотри свою паскудную улыбку с лица, изверг, они тебе все же родичами приходились!"

languages.text: “呃，呃……可你和你的伙计们一定会确保他们一个不剩，对不对？赶紧收起来你那恶行的笑容吧，你这讨厌鬼！他们可是你的族人！”
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: “呃，呃……可你和你的伙计们一定会确保他们一个不剩，对不对？赶紧收起来你那恶行的笑容吧，你这讨厌鬼！他们可是你的族人！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mouais... Mais vous et vos potes, vous avez comme qui dirait accéléré le processus, non ? Effacez donc ce sourire obscène, espèce de monstre. C'étaient vos semblables ! »
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: « Mouais... Mais vous et vos potes, vous avez comme qui dirait accéléré le processus, non ? Effacez donc ce sourire obscène, espèce de monstre. C'étaient vos semblables ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ya, pero tus amigos y tú os esmerasteis en acelerar su extinción, ¿no? Borra esa sonrisa de tu cara, monstruo, ¡eran parientes tuyos!».
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya, pero tus amigos y tú os esmerasteis en acelerar su extinción, ¿no? Borra esa sonrisa de tu cara, monstruo, ¡eran parientes tuyos!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ、そう。でも、あなたとその仲間は、彼らが絶滅する道を後押ししたわよね？その薄汚い笑いを拭いなさい。キンだったのでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そう。でも、あなたとその仲間は、彼らが絶滅する道を後押ししたわよね？その薄汚い笑いを拭いなさい。キンだったのでしょう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hm-hmm. Aber Ihr und Eure Freunde habt ihnen auf dem Weg zu ihrer Auslöschung tatkräftig unter die Arme gegriffen, nicht wahr? Spart Euch dieses widerwärtige Grinsen, sie waren Eure Verwandtschaft!"
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: "Hm-hmm. Aber Ihr und Eure Freunde habt ihnen auf dem Weg zu ihrer Auslöschung tatkräftig unter die Arme gegriffen, nicht wahr? Spart Euch dieses widerwärtige Grinsen, sie waren Eure Verwandtschaft!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

languages.text: "Evet. Tabii sen ve arkadaşların, soyları tükenirken onlara yardım etmekten geri durmadınız, değil mi? O iğrenç gülümsemeyi yüzünden sil adi yaratık. Onlar soydaşındı!"
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh. But you and your pals made sure to help them on their way to their extinction, didn't you? Wipe that filthy smile off your face, creep — they were your kin!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Tabii sen ve arkadaşların, soyları tükenirken onlara yardım etmekten geri durmadınız değil mi? O iğrenç gülümsemeyi yüzünden sil adi şey seni. Onlar senin soydaşındı!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
